p: Volatile oil of Cichorium glandulosum Boiss et Huet (CG) was extracted by steam distillation and was obtained from Professor Mao Juju, Professor of Chinese Medicine at Jing Shi He Zi College of Pharmacy. Following extraction, the volatile oil of CG was suspended in distilled water, with a ratio of 1: 10, and shaken vigorously 20 times to form an emulsion before gastric administration to the rats in this study.
